___identity-file.description: SSH private key file for deploy

___ssh-alias.description: SSH alias to connect to the repository

___repositories.description: Already configured repositories. A hash of repository names (keys) and configured settings (values)

___archive-url.description: Optional url where the application archive was downloaded

___cliconfig-override.description: Overrides cliconfig with a file from another directory

___ssh-dir.description: Path to .ssh directory, to store generated keys and change ssh configuration

___clic-dir.description: Path to directory where clic stores its files

___global-vars.description: This is a hash of variable names (keys) and values (values).

___vhosts.description: Links a vhost name (keys) to settings (values)
